mapper.select: select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from comments where comment_category=#{commentCategory} order by comment_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from comments where comment_category=#{commentCategory} and comment_name like #{commentName} order by comment_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from comments where comment_category=#{commentCategory} and comment_content like #{commentContent} order by comment_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select * from(select sub.*,rownum rnum from (select * from comments c join users u on u.user_id = c.user_id where comment_category=#{commentCategory} and user_nick like #{userNick} order by comment_no desc) sub) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10
mapper.update: update comments set comment_count= (select comment_count from comments where comment_no=#{commentNo})+1 where comment_no = #{commentNo}
